term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - spectral irradiance, E_λ
term.title: spectral irradiance

item.text: Irradiance, E, at wavelengthλ per unit wavelength interval. The SI unit is W m-3, but a commonly used unit is W m-2 nm-1.
